raw_comment: I  notice that over time the electricity in the world has increased in both the clean energy areas and the fossil fuels areas. I wonder why India generates less electricity than the US even though they have a bigger population. This can relate to my community because I live in the US and it makes me curious to see how much clean energy and fossil fuels my country uses in comparison to others. A catchy headline would be: "On the road to cleaner energy?"
ace_sentences: Over time, the electricity generation in the world has increased.
The electricity generation from clean energy has increased.
The electricity generation from fossil fuels has increased.
India generates less electricity than the US.
India has a bigger population than the US.
I wonder why India generates less electricity than the US.
This situation relates to my community.
I want to know how much clean energy the US uses compared to other countries.
I want to know how much fossil fuels the US uses compared to other countries.
The headline is: On the road to cleaner energy?
